text: Novosphingobium malaysiense is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-spore- forming bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from mangrove soil from the Tanjung Lumpur rive in Pahang in Malaysia. == References == == External links == *Type strain of Novosphingobium malaysiense at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2014 Category:Sphingomonadales
title: Novosphingobium malaysiense
